roleset.name: create, make
roleset.note: FORM-V NOTES: Comparison with 'create'. Nominal 'forming' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls create-26.4, appear-48.1.1, reflexive_appearance-48.1.2. (from form.01-v)
FORMATION-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls create-26.4. (from formation.01-n)
FORMING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from forming.01-n)

roles.note: args 2 and 4 not seen yet. (from formation.01-n)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Peter Drake, biotechnology analyst for Vector Securities International, Chicago, thinks market uncertainty may encourage small companies to form more strategic alliances with big corporations.
example.arg: more strategic alliances with big corporations

example.name: passive, with source
example.text: [NCNB Texas National]-1, formed *trace*-1 from the remnants of of the failed First RepublicBank Corp. of Dallas, contributed $76.9 million to NCNB's bottom line in the third quarter.
example.arg: from the remnants of of the failed First RepublicBank Corp. of Dallas

example.name: nominal rel: forming
example.text: ---------------------- The forming of a market involves a process . This process may be very tortuous . At present , this market is in the process of forming .

example.name: autogen1
example.text: Friday , 42 franchisees announced the formation of an association-- called A.P. Association Inc. -- to `` preserve the integrityof the Arby 's system . ''
example.arg: of an association -- called A.P. Association Inc. -- to `` preserve the integrity of the Arby 's system

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the formation of a holding company enabling the savings bank topursue nontraditional banking activities under a new federal law
example.arg: of a holding company enabling the savings bank to pursue nontraditional banking activities under a new federal law

example.name: With COM (probably not source in this case)
example.text: the formation of a national emergency unity government with Ariel Sharon 's opposition Likud Party
example.arg: of a national emergency unity government
with Ariel Sharon's opposition Likud Party

example.name: args0 and 1
example.text: the formation of a new political party by James Soong

example.name: with materials/source
example.text: Vortex formation out of two-dimensional orifices

example.name: swapped product/materials
example.text: Personal formation into the likeness of Christ

roleset.name: comprise
roleset.note: FORMING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from forming.02-n)

example.name: cf. 'make up'
example.text: Commission income from domestic stock and bond sales accounts form a large portion of Japanese securities companies' earnings.
example.arg: Commission income from domestic stock and bond sales accounts
a large portion of Japanese securities companies' earnings

example.name: comprise again
example.text: The labels were breathy: ``Within its sheltering walls is a microcosm of a thousand years in garden design ... [a rose garden, herb garden, serpentine garden, flower fields, an apple orchard]-1 ... organized in a patchwork of 50-by-50-foot squares [*]-1 to form `rooms'...
